DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy Glizigen Viusid administration treatment external anogenital wart child adolescent . The duration double-blind placebo control phase 3 clinical trial 12 week . The estimated number person recruit randomize study 76 . Variables assess : time disappearance lesion , reduction number lesion change aspect lesion .
DOC.criteria: No previous treatment anogenital wart Negative serology HB HIV . Signed informed consent . Pregnancy Treatment steroid , immunesuppressors , immunemodulators local systemic antiviral drug . Hypersensitivity Glizigen Viusid :
